title: PBE i want to help button doesnt work
body:
Hello when i click I want to help it just reloads the [page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) i was looking evrywhere to find help but i didnt find nothing about that. Please somebody help thanks.

Edit: problem solved thanks to Targons Blade and [this link](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)

replies.body:
I'd suggest [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or try a different browser, then visit [this link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) to see if it works.

Let me know if this helped.

i cleared my browser's cache and then went to that link but it said Something went wrong but maybe i will just try it later
thanks for the advice.

Was it a Blitzcrank error page? If so, using a VPN such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) should do as a workaround for accessing this page.

I hope this worked!

I got a heimer error pop up at first then it fixed, but now it's stuck on Application received even though i got one in my emails screenshots shown below 

https://gyazo.com/ec0da40a19fffd7216a5f87ee171cb1e

https://gyazo.com/99e5885dc7985c2af9d9640fbf06719b

Please help would love to contribute to fixing bugs

Have you tried *all accounts* that you've applied for PBE access with? This commonly occurs if another account was accepted for PBE access that shares the same email as this account.

I hope this helped!

Ahhh brilliant ill check this now, thanks for the reply 

Update: Unfortunately this is the account that got accepted for PBE :( im just sat here stuck on the application received screen, is there no other way around the problem where i can prove i have the email and we can by-pass this screen?

Hmm.. Maybe you're using the wrong links. Try [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), then visit the [EUW Landing Page](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/) log into your account, then visit the [EUW PBE Signup Page](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Finger's crossed! ^.^
Ahhh brilliant ill check this now, thanks for the reply

Gotcha. So for this specific error, there are specific steps to take. First, you'll want to use another device (computer), log into the account that was accepted for PBE access from the [EUNE Landing Page](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/), then visit the signup page, again, specifically from [this link.](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) I goofed up by accidentally giving you the NA PBE signup link before.

I hope this works for you!

Ive had this same problem with PBE sign up and even posted about it a few days ago. I've tried 2 different computers on completely different networks with internet, edge, chrome, and firefox. I even tried my phone with data and a network separate from the two previously used with safari and chrome. I'm pretty sure I must be doing something wrong. Any help would be great.
I have same problem cleared Cashe uninstall browser, it just keeps reloading the same page, and i was invited to play on PBE. Very sad times

So @Targons Blade   ,   I was doing all these steps (I use Google Chrome) and I clear cookies and Cache, Nothing. I went to Microsoft Edge, Nothing. Non of the tips you gave are working for me, and the error message I get is iBlitzcrank skin saying "Error 500". I Have not clue what to do.
